title: Collaborative Science Inquiry Project: Online Real-Time Team-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific terminology comprehension and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Science collaborative learning process conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Students are organized into teams of four and conduct monthly online presentations.

learning_goals: Students can systematically apply collaborative learning strategies for scientific problem-solving.
Learners consistently participate in team activities with over 80% attendance on online platforms.
Each team completes three scientific inquiry projects over six months and presents them for final evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
